definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
water spot/water stain/wet spot/damp patch/water damage

sentences.english: Use stain removal spray gun with stain removal agent to do pre-wash preparation.
sentences.chinese: 利用去漬槍，配合預處理劑完成洗前預處理。

sentences.english: The ecological environment of waterlogging land in Four-lakes Region was influenced both by natural and human-caused disturbance factors.
sentences.chinese: 自然與人爲干擾共同作用於四湖地區的澇漬生態環境。

sentences.english: Through the method of characteristics of besmirch flexibly.
sentences.chinese: 去漬方法應根據污漬特點靈活運用方法。

sentences.english: You can see that it is covered with coffee and tea stains.
sentences.chinese: 你可以看到它充滿著咖啡和茶漬。

sentences.english: Cut the fish fillets into 4cm chunks and add in marinade for about 1 hour.
sentences.chinese: 將魚肉批片，切成長4釐米塊狀，加醃料拌漬1小時。

sentences.english: The clothes are stained with grease.
Spontaneous combustion ignited the heap of oil-soaked rags in the basement.
sentences.chinese: 自燃使得地下室漬油的破布堆燃燒起來了。

sentences.english: After he had washed away the traces of the wine and sleep had left him, he began to repent.
sentences.chinese: 他用涼水把酒漬洗掉，睡意全消時，他開始後悔了。

sentences.english: Minnan cabbage plumule's pickling methods and its soaking technique with soy sauce are discussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 介紹閩南菜心的醃製和醬油漬加工技術。

sentences.english: This paper analyzes the causation of the flood disaster according to the flood situation in the reclamation area in Heilongjiang Province.
sentences.chinese: 針對黑龍江墾區的澇漬現象，分析了澇漬產生的原因。

sentences.english: This paper analyzes the causation of the flood disaster according to the flood situation in the reclamation area in Heilongjiang Province.
sentences.chinese: 針對黑龍江墾區的澇漬現象，分析了澇漬產生的原因。

sentences.english: I boil my baby bottles with baking soda to get them clean.
sentences.chinese: 用小蘇打水煮一下盆盆罐罐可以去除上面的食物漬。

sentences.english: Rub the wax on bathroom fixtures to prevent water spots too.
sentences.chinese: 在浴室其他設備上你也可以擦些車蠟用來防水漬。

sentences.english: The pipe is caked with tar.
Quality control technology of light-salted and vinegar-cured Dentex tumiforns fillets in the industrial production was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了輕鹽醋漬黃鯛魚片工業化生產的工藝技術。

sentences.english: Tukemono of Thousand pieces is made by cutting turnip to very thin pieces, but it has toughness.
sentences.chinese: 千枚漬是把蕪菁切得很薄，但有韌度。

definition: soup/hot or boiling water/decoction of medicinal herbs/water in which sth has been boiled
thick paste of fermented soybean/marinated in soy paste/paste/jam
name of a famous Tang dynasty wine/same as 白酒[bai2 jiu3]
tempura/deep-fried cooking/also called 甜不辣[tian2 bu4 la4]
the cylindrical adductor muscle of bivalve shellfish such as scallops
flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
